attributes.additional_details:
At college my attendance has gone down 10% because of them and now I have to turn up to college 1 hour before any lessons start to make sure I’m there on time. I’m sure people have had a lot of issues similar to this with work and education and by speaking to staff in person and on the phone, I’m telling you, they don’t really care. 
The strikes are making us pay for other forms on transport and ruining the Christmas period for many especially the elderly.
attributes.background: This is a money hungry company that have rude staff and are constantly delayed and cancelled. They’re only giving refunds for people who travelled at the ‘worst’ time of congestion over summer but what about now? Now that prices will go up we should not be paying for their disgusting services.
